price: Izina rya Nyagasani wawe, Nyirubuhambare n’icyubahiro, ryuje ubutungane n’imigisha.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
